title: Favourites
intro: Customise this playlist to include your favourite songs from each Symphony of Voices! Use the heart buttons on the tracks to select your favourite tracks, and click the same button to remove it if you need to! </br>(Note: the playlists are saved on your local cache, meaning that one playlist saved here cannot be transferred to another device)

title: Symphony of Voices 2019
intro:
Symphony of Voices 2019 was held at the Esplanade Concert Hall on the 22nd of May, 2019.
The theme for this year was A World Where Roses Bloom.

first_half.name: Two Lenten Motets (Memento Mei, Domine and Crucem Tuam Adoramus, Domine)

second_half.name: O My Love Is Like A Red, Red Rose
second_half.mp3: 9 O My Love Is Like A Red, Red Rose

second_half.name: 可爱的玫瑰花
second_half.mp3: 14 Ke Ai De Mei Gui Hua

second_half.name: 玫瑰玫瑰我爱你
second_half.mp3: 15 Mei Gui Mei Gui Wo Ai Ni

second_half.name: Red Roses for a Blue Lady
second_half.composer: Sid Tepper, Roy C. Bennett (arr. Ralph Hunter)
second_half.mp3: 16 Red Roses for a Blue Lady

yt.desc: The SOV2019 videos have not been processed yet, sorry about that! This page will be updated once they are ready, and they'll be available on jumpcutfindo as per usual.

dls.intro: Audio for this particular SOV is available for download in the following sections. If any of these links go down, please drop us a message so that we can rectify the problem ASAP. Thank you! :)

title: Symphony of Voices 2010
intro:
Symphony of Voices 2010 was held on the 11th of May, 2010 at the Esplanade Concert Hall.
The theme for this year was Masquerade.
Note: for this year there wasn't really a specific theme, but instead the concert was divided into a few different sections. You can take a look at the booklet for more information in the Google Drive.

second_half.name: Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening
second_half.mp3: 14 Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening
